\i\b0 Version 1.9\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i0 \cf0 \'95 Added search\ \'95 Add bookmark shortcut changed to Command+Y \i \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \cf0 \ Version 1.8\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i0 \cf0 \'95 Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard compatible\
\i \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \cf0 Version 1.7\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i0 \cf0 \'95 URL icons (favicons) are displayed next to bookmarks\ \'95 Added toolbar button for saving bookmarks\ \'95 Added spell checking to the Name and Notes fields\ \'95 Fixed tag suggestions on Tiger that stopped working with Delicious.com 2.0\ \'95 Increased maximum length of Notes field to 1000 to take advantage of new maximum allowed by Delicious.com 2.0\ \'95 Bookmark saving is faster\ \'95 Safari startup is faster\ \'95 Renamed del.icio.us menu to Delicious and moved to the left of the Help menu\ \'95 Improved reliability of \i Import Bookmarks from Safari \i0 \ \'95 Fixed several issues that prevented DeliciousSafari from loading on some computers\ \'95 No longer a SIMBL plug-in\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i \cf0 \ Version 1.6\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i0 \cf0 \'95 Tag suggestions when adding bookmarks\ \'95 Safari to del.icio.us bookmark importer\ \'95 Combine tags to narrow results in favorite tags menu\ \'95 Add bookmark shortcut changed to Control+D\ \'95 Renamed \i Add Bookmark... \i0 to \i Add del.icio.us Bookmark... \i0 to allow shortcut to be changed from System Preferences (under Keyboard & Mouse, Keyboard Shortcuts)\ \'95 Fixed bug that prevented some URLs from being saved\
\i \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \cf0 Version 1.5\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i0 \cf0 \'95 Re-posting a URL causes the post fields to fill with the existing values\uc0\u8232 \i NOTE: Because of a limitation of del.icio.us, the \b do not share \b0 field does not display the current value\
\i0 \'95 Added WebKit compatibility\ \
\i Version 1.4\
\i0 \'95 Notes field wraps text on long entries\ \'95 Fixed bug on Tiger that caused tags not to be saved \i \ \ Version 1.3\
\i0 \'95 Tag auto-completion\ \'95 Dramatically improved performance\ \'95 Bookmarks sorted by name under each tag\ \'95 Expanded support of HTML character entities for automatically generated bookmark titles \i \ \ Version 1.2\
\i0 \'95 Initial release}
